description: Three open-book multiple choice tests covering core science aspects, each quiz worth 10%. Completed in one sitting with feedback provided afterward.
Three group tasks: writing a critical summary of provided material, peer reviewing other groups' work, and responding to peer reviews. Group marks adjusted by peer-assessed contributions.
1000-word reflective essay on the peer review process, drawing from group experiences. Requires submission to Studiosity for feedback before final submission.
Weekly contributions to lesson-related discussions, graded on quality and constructiveness. Best posts submitted for marking in Week 11.
